name: Armor of God (ProdigalSon Games, Drums)
description:
The Flesh will have victory over us unless we put on the full Armor of God before stepping into battle.

GAMEPLAY
- Collect the full Armor of God by unlocking each piece with a Scripture
- Each piece of armor provides an unique ability to help traverse the dungeon
- Defeat the boss after obtaining the full Armor of God

CONTROLS
WASD / Arrows : Move (Walk into objects to interact with them)
Space / Enter: Confirm
ESC: Pause Menu

  • CREDITS
    Game Design / Programming: Nelson L
